pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Inference for a Binary Treatment and Continuous Outcome using Bayesian Causal Forests // Causal inference for a binary treatment and continuous outcome using Bayesian Causal Forests. See Hahn, Murray and Carvalho (2017) arXiv:1706.09523 for additional information. This implementation relies on code originally accompanying Pratola et. al. (2013) arXiv:1309.1906.
